mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.venue_id AS "reserveVenue.id", a.field_id AS "reserveField.id", a.cons_info AS "consInfo", a.start_time AS "startTime", a.end_time AS "endTime", a.start_date AS "startDate", a.end_date AS "endDate", a.cons_data_id AS "consData.id", a.frequency AS "frequency", a.cons_week AS "consWeek", a.half_court AS "halfCourt", v.name AS "reserveVenue.name", d.reserve_type AS "consData.reserveType", d.user_name AS "consData.userName", d.cons_type AS "consData.consType", d.cons_date AS "consData.consDate", f.name AS "reserveField.name", a.cons_price AS "consPrice", a.order_price AS "orderPrice", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN reserve_field f ON f.id = a.field_id LEFT JOIN reserve_venue v ON v.id = a.venue_id LEFT JOIN reserve_venue_cons d ON d.id = a.cons_data_id
mapper.select: SELECT a.order_price AS "orderPrice", a.start_time AS "startTime", a.end_time AS "endTime", field.fieldName AS "fieldName", field.projectName AS "projectName" FROM reserve_venue_cons_item as a INNER JOIN reserve_venue_cons as b on a.cons_data_id=b.id INNER JOIN (select f.id as id ,p.name as projectName,f.name as fieldName from reserve_field as f INNER JOIN reserve_project as p on f.project_id=p.id) as field on a.field_id=field.id WHERE b.id = #{orderId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reserve_venue_cons_item( id, start_date, end_date, cons_data_id, venue_id, field_id, cons_price, order_price, cons_info, frequency, cons_week, half_court, cons_date, start_time, end_time, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, tenant_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{consData.id}, #{reserveVenue.id}, #{reserveField.id}, #{consPrice}, #{orderPrice}, #{consInfo}, #{frequency}, #{consWeek}, #{halfCourt}, #{consDate}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{tenantId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE reserve_venue_cons_item SET start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, cons_data_id = #{consData.id}, venue_id = #{reserveVenue.id}, field_id = #{reserveField.id}, cons_info = #{consInfo}, frequency = #{frequency}, cons_week = #{consWeek}, half_court = #{halfCourt}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, cons_price = #{consPrice}, order_price = #{orderPrice}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, tenant_id = #{tenantId} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT( CASE WHEN tmp2.parent_field_id is NULL THEN tmp2.field_id END)+2*COUNT( CASE WHEN parent_field_id is not NULL THEN tmp2.field_id END) AS num, tmp2.project_id AS projectId, tmp2.name AS projectName FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT(tmp.field_id),r.parent_field_id,f.project_id,p.name FROM (SELECT i.field_id FROM reserve_venue_cons_item i WHERE i.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT_WS(' ',i.cons_date,i.end_time),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') >= NOW() AND STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT_WS(' ',i.cons_date,i.start_time),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') <= NOW() AND i.venue_id = #{reserveVenue.id} ) tmp LEFT JOIN reserve_field_relation r on r.parent_field_id = tmp.field_id ,reserve_field f,reserve_project p WHERE tmp.field_id = f.id AND p.id = f.project_id) tmp2 GROUP BY tmp2.project_id;
